title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 6.11 - Prepayment of certain expenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 6.11 - Prepayment of certain expenses

State Regulations

Claims for certain articles may be paid in advance of
receipt. Such articles will be limited to articles normally prepaid, such as
postage, subscriptions and rent. Appropriate documentation must be maintained
at the agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
6.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
